_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Java

Java Egg for Pterodactyl. Pre-configured, secure, and ready-to-use for Java applications.

startup: if [ ! -f /home/container/{{STARTUP_FILE}} ]; then echo 'Error: {{STARTUP_FILE}} not found!'; exit 1; fi; if [ -f /home/container/pom.xml ]; then mvn clean install; fi; java -Xms128M -jar /home/container/{{STARTUP_FILE}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Java App Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq file unzip git maven openjdk-8-jdk openjdk-11-jdk openjdk-17-jdk openjdk-21-jdk openjdk-25-jdk
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
echo -e 'Install complete'
exit 0

variables.name: Startup File
variables.description: The main file to start the server (e.g. server.jar).
